seo.title: Interactive WCAG/RGAA Quiz with Gemini and Jina
seo.description: Test your knowledge of web accessibility guidelines (WCAG/RGAA) with this dynamic quiz. This project uses Vue.js 3, Google's Gemini API for question generation, and Jina Reader for content analysis.

concept.title: Quiz Generator, with a hint of hallucination
concept.intro:
The goal of this project is to explore the results of the RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) principle.
Give it a topic or a URL, and the AI will try to derive a quiz from it.
Keep in mind, it's not perfect: errors or 'hallucinations' are possible!
concept.techdetails_description: Our goal is to let you benefit from 'Retrieval-Augmented Generation' (RAG) without being an expert. The principle: the AI is 'augmented' with the content you provide. Technically, the `flash` model from [Jina AI Reader](https://jina.ai/reader/) reads the URL and transforms it into clean Markdown optimized for AIs (LLM-Friendly). This text is then passed to [Google Gemini](https://ai.google.dev) which uses it as the single source of truth for the quiz. Without a URL, Gemini relies on its general knowledge.
